basic.blooming: Succulent plants, blooms sometimes, with white small flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, with adequate sunlight, leaves turning to orange red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Needs plenty of sunshine, avoid direct sunlight in summer
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering in summer and winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
